content: Hi I want to travel to varakala next weekend for chill trip

Wonderful! Varkala is a fantastic destination for a relaxing getaway. Let me provide you with some top recommendations to make the most of your trip there next weekend.

I've searched for some great hotel options in Varkala that fit your preferences for a chill trip. One excellent choice is the [Varkala Cliff Resort](https://www.booking.com/hotel/in/varkala-cliff.html?aid=1710306&no_rooms=1&group_adults=2), which is located right on the beautiful Varkala Cliff overlooking the Arabian Sea. With its serene beachfront setting and cozy, comfortable rooms, it's perfect for a tranquil retreat.

Another wonderful option is the [Black Beach Resort](https://www.booking.com/hotel/in/black-beach-resort-varkala.html?aid=1710306&no_rooms=1&group_adults=2), which offers stunning views of the famous Varkala Cliff and easy access to the pristine black sand beach. The resort has a laid-back vibe and excellent amenities to help you unwind.

For your travel to Varkala, I'd also recommend looking into [train schedules from major cities like Mumbai or Trivandrum](https://www.makemytrip.com/railways/search?from=Mumbai&to=Varkala&journey_date=2026-01-24&adults=1&children=0&infants=0&class=GENERAL&pref=NONE&returnjourney=false&cabinclass=&category=NONE&trainType=NONE&sourceNode=NONE&targetNode=NONE&source=HOMEPAGE) to make the journey a relaxing one. 

Does this initial set of options sound appealing to you? Let me know if you have any other preferences or questions as you finalize your Varkala trip plans.
